sentences.en: Otherwise, choosing market segmenting and niche so as to change the relationship from competition to commensalism and reciprocity between first-mover and second-mover should be a good choice.
sentences.cn: 相反，则宜采取市场细分“拾余补漏”策略将与先行者的竞争关系转化为互惠共生关系。

sentences.en: Some associations of species are almost a form of commensalism.
sentences.cn: 有些种类的组合几乎是共栖的形式.

sentences.en: The symbiosis behavior mode of enterprise and farmer household include commensalism, dissymmetry mutualism and symmetry mutualism.
sentences.cn: 企业与农户共生行为模式包括偏利共生、非对称性互惠共生和对称性互惠共生三种。

sentences.en: This nest is called the mixed nests is indeed heterogeneous commensalism.
sentences.cn: 这种蚁巢叫做混合性蚁巢,实为异种共栖.

words.tran_cn: 共餐者；[生态] 共生体
